DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the correlation between maximum inspiratory pressure (Pi max) and the diaphragm maximum inspiratory excursion measured with ultrasound during the weaning from invasive mechanical ventilation.
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between Pi Max and Diaphragm Maximum Inspiratory Excursion Detected With Ultrasound During Weaning
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 years. Invasive Mechanical Ventilation > 24 hours. Readiness for weaning (following clinician decision made according to recent guidelines). Impossibility to perform an echography.
